duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform configuration, installation, troubleshooting, maintenance and repair of hardware and software related to networking, VoIP, and Wireless network equipment.
Utilize ITSM software for logging, forwarding, working, and closing tickets for all support cases.
Provide excellent customer service with problem resolution.
Assist with Patch Management of network equipment and systems as assigned.
Administer moves, adds, and changes for users of IT systems, which include VPN access, MDM solution, instant messaging, and web conferencing.
Ensure documentation is available and up-to-date for all assigned procedures in accordance with department standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a computer or business-related field from an accredited college or university and 2-3 years related work experience, or equivalent combination of education and experience. Experience must be in a networked environment.
